intro: Elatostema trichomanes, commonly known as the silverleaf stellaria, is a small herbaceous plant native to parts of Asia and Africa. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes plants known for their stinging hairs. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments and has slender, creeping stems covered in fine, silvery hairs. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a distinctive waxy coating. Elatostema trichomanes produces small, greenish flowers that are clustered in umbels, and it is often found in rocky or forested areas.
